sections.title: How to Use
content: Enter your package details including weight, dimensions, and origin/destination ZIP codes. Click 'Compare Shipping Rates' to see estimated costs from all major carriers sorted by price. Each option includes delivery time and features to help you choose the best shipping method.

sections.title: Understanding Dimensional Weight

sections.title: Common Questions
content:
Q: Why is my light package expensive?
Large but light boxes trigger dimensional weight pricing. Try smaller packaging or flat-rate boxes to reduce costs.

Q: Do prices include surcharges?
Quotes include base shipping; some carriers add residential, fuel, or delivery area surcharges. Use them as planning estimates and verify at purchase.

Q: How accurate are delivery times?
Transit times are estimates. Weather, customs, and carrier backlogs can extend deliveryâ€”build a buffer for critical shipments.

Q: Can I compare international shipments?
Yes. Input destination country codes; note that duties/taxes are not included and vary by destination.

Q: When should I choose insurance?
Insure fragile or high-value items. Compare insurance costs to item value and consider carrier liability limits.
